name: Clock and time for kids (FREE)
description:
Effective assistance to teach kids to read and understand time and how clocks work.

"What time is it?" helps kids to learn how to read a clock and tell time. Six levels with increasing difficulty allow a child to get familiar with the clock and how time "works". Funny "talking" clock says what time it shows and provide a variety of exercises to the learning material.

The clock can "speak" following languages:
  - English (computer voice, if your device supports it)
  - Russian
  - German
- Spanish
- Portuguese


This free version contains:
  - first six levels (from simple presentations of minute and hour hands to the understanding of "half past one" or "quarter to five")
  - no ads
  - no "in-app" products
